bug.description: Clicking on "query again" on a page like <denchmark-link:http://localhost:8000/queries/125/>http://localhost:8000/queries/125/</denchmark-link> leads to <denchmark-link:http://localhost:8000/requery/125/>http://localhost:8000/requery/125/</denchmark-link> with an empty image box
